title: Bug: Prisma seed fails with 'Argument sku is missing'
description: Running npm run prisma:seed fails because the seed script is not properly mapping the sku field when creating MasterProduct records.
steps_to_reproduce: Observe error: Argument sku is missing
expected_behavior: Seed script imports all 9,488 products from cleaned_products.json into MasterProduct table
actual_behavior: Seed fails with Prisma error: Argument sku is missing at line 107
root_cause_hypothesis: The seed script is not mapping product_id from JSON to sku field in MasterProduct create

regression: npm run prisma:seed completes without errors

acceptance_criteria: AC1: npm run prisma:seed completes successfully
AC2: All 9,488 products imported into MasterProduct table
